alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 11:25PM PDT until March 30 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of eastern, north central, northeast and south central Nevada. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
